name: Brick'um
description:
UNFORTUNATELY THE WebGL BUILD DOES NOT WORK AT THE MOMENT. PLEASE TRY THE THE GOOGLE PLAY VERSION.

A fun brick breaking game with a few different game-play modes.

  1. Campaign Mode: Play through a few campaigns with different brick shapes and layouts.
  2. Free Play: Play in a level where blocks re-spawn and the ball gets faster and faster the longer you survive.
  3. Kid Mode: An easier version of Campaign Mode. The ball is a little slower and the player cant lose.
